item.title: Lokayukta raids multiple locations in Bidar, Raichur, Ballari districts
item.description:
<![CDATA[In a coordinated action, Lokayukta Police conducted raids on multiple locations in Bidar, Raichur and Ballari districts on Wednesday.
In Ballari, Lokayukta raided Taluk Officer in the Backward Classes Welfare Department R.H. Lokesh and his associates. His residence at Ramanjaneya Nagar in Ballari city and four other residences belonging to his relatives and associates were raided simultaneously.
As per information provided by Lokayukta Superintendent of Police Siddraju, the police found docume...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Two from State die on the spot, four suffer injuries in road accident in Telangana
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two people died on the spot and four suffered injuries in a road accident on the Mahabubnagar-Raichur National Highway No 167 near Gopalapuram village in Devarakadra Mandal of Telangana’s Mahabubnagar district on Tuesday.
The victims have been identified as 58-year-old Basavaraj Nandikolmath, who was a freelance journalist working for Prajavani, a Kannada daily, in Lingsugur, and 67-year-old Jangamamurthy.
The injured identified as Chinnayya, Amaresh, Bhagawan and Mallanna have been shifted to...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.description: <![CDATA[Excise officials in Raichur conducted a significant raid on a house in Korwar Oni, situated on Gadwal Road, uncovering a large stash of illicit liquor. The property, owned by Gajji Veeresh, was found to contain 650 litres of illegal liquor, ₹22,520 in cash, and other materials used in the illegal trade....]]>
item.author: System User

item.description: <![CDATA[A 24-year-old woman named Saraswati passed away three days after undergoing a cesarean delivery at the Raichur Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS) on January 2. Saraswati, a resident of Haddinal in Devadurg taluk, delivered her fourth child, a baby boy, before being shifted to the ICU due to severe hypertension....]]>
